Vulois/Terminess

Vulois gets hit by Unitron's missles. He looks at his damaged treads, 
and his infuriated with anger.


"So you want to play that game, do ya? I'LL SHOW YOU HOW TO 
PLAY!!!!!!!!!!!"

Vulois TF's to Robot mode, put his jets on and hovers in the air. He 
pulls out his blasters and starts firing, on full power. He isn't 
going to let his chance for home get away.

______________________________________________________________________

Terminess smiles to her self. She thinks destructive thoughts.

*So, he thinks he can dodge my missles, eh? Well, I'll show him. And 
that Hades looks weak. I'll think I'll finish him off!*

Terminess keep 2 of the manu-guns locked on Unitron, while th thire 
goes to blast Hades. On top of that, she programs the auto-guns to 
fire at all except Unitron and Hades.
